Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2011 07:20AM BTinAZ wrote: I will tell you what the oncologist told my sister and it will be the best advice you will hear.......stay away from these posts.  The only people on them are people who have nothing to do but sit around and complain. I have found out that he is 100% correct.  And, MOST of the info you read on these sites is NOT true.  Walk away from here and do not look back.  I come here occasionally to tell people this and many have thanked me!
Posts.Title: The worst part is not knowing... lc1975 awb
